video.title: How I got into Web Dev as a Computer Science Major
video.description:
Chris talks about what it's like to enter the web dev scene as a computer science student who studies at a university that doesn't cover web dev at all in their curriculum. He also goes over some ways that studying computer science has helped him in his web dev journey indirectly.

Talk from Chris Tse at the FreeCodeCamp OKC meet up.

🐦Chris on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChrisMTse

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Gary Marroquin
topLevelComment.text: Very much appreciated this video thank you ❤
